message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $115, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I'm getting close to your price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I can do $112.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at $112.50?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll give you $112. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $112?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I've already offered you $112, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think that's a fair price for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $112?
